sn22.60:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
sn22.60:1.3: Atha kho mahali licchavi yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho mahali licchavi bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.60:2.4: Natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattanam visuddhiya;
sn22.60:3.1: “Atthi, mahali, hetu atthi paccayo sattanam sankilesaya;
sn22.60:3.3: Atthi, mahali, hetu, atthi paccayo sattanam visuddhiya;
sn22.60:4.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu katamo paccayo sattanam sankilesaya;
sn22.60:5.1: “Rupanca hidam, mahali, ekantadukkham abhavissa dukkhanupatitam dukkhavakkantam anavakkantam sukhena, nayidam satta rupasmim sarajjeyyum.
sn22.60:5.2: Yasma ca kho, mahali, rupam sukham sukhanupatitam sukhavakkantam anavakkantam dukkhena, tasma satta rupasmim sarajjanti;
sn22.60:5.4: Ayam kho, mahali, hetu, ayam paccayo sattanam sankilesaya;
sn22.60:6.1: Vedana ca hidam, mahali, ekantadukkha abhavissa dukkhanupatita dukkhavakkanta anavakkanta sukhena, nayidam satta vedanaya sarajjeyyum.
sn22.60:6.2: Yasma ca kho, mahali, vedana sukha sukhanupatita sukhavakkanta anavakkanta dukkhena, tasma satta vedanaya sarajjanti;
sn22.60:6.5: Ayampi kho, mahali, hetu, ayam paccayo sattanam sankilesaya.
sn22.60:7.2: sankhara ca hidam, mahali, ekantadukkha abhavissamsu dukkhanupatita dukkhavakkanta anavakkanta sukhena, nayidam satta sankharesu sarajjeyyum.
sn22.60:7.3: Yasma ca kho, mahali, sankhara sukha sukhanupatita sukhavakkanta anavakkanta dukkhena, tasma satta sankharesu sarajjanti;
sn22.60:7.6: Ayampi kho, mahali, hetu, ayam paccayo sattanam sankilesaya.

sn22.60:8.2: Yasma ca kho, mahali, vinnanam sukham sukhanupatitam sukhavakkantam anavakkantam dukkhena, tasma satta vinnanasmim sarajjanti;
sn22.60:8.4: Ayampi kho, mahali, hetu ayam paccayo sattanam sankilesaya.

sn22.60:9.6: Ayam kho, mahali, hetu, ayam paccayo, sattanam visuddhiya.
